comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Violet Romer (1886-1970), born in San Francisco as Violet Romer Shawhan. She danced in London and New York, and was photographed by Edward Weston. She turns up in several New York Times articles in the 1910s.

comment.author: 32394499@N03
comment._content: La imagen de la mujer parece tener luz propia,en medio de un entorno absolutamente oscuro.Su cuidada iluminación,el equilibrio de la pose y el acentuado contraste del fondo plano,que convierte a VIOLET  en el centro absoluto de atención,son particularidades que valoro de esta fotografía.

comment.author: 33049620@N05
comment._content: This is such a beautiful photograph. She looks like she is at peace in this photo and seems to be in a calm state of mind. The positioning of her arms, hand, and feet are done so beautifully and the way the clothing drapes and flows with the body adds to the idea of calmness and comfort. This is just such an awesome photograph.
